message.nebula_tinker.modifier.acupoint: the skill Deadly Acupoint has activated
modifier.nebula_tinker.acupoint.flavor: You are below the Killing Line!
modifier.nebula_tinker.acupoint.descript: Have chance to kill monsters below 25% health directly (activate on Bosses below 12.5% health)
modifier.nebula_tinker.frenzy.descriptio: Player will gain health when attacking with a Speed buff
modifier.nebula_tinker.causal_truncation: Having chance to damage 33% total health to target
